level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: In applying and construing this uniform part, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-107
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following ยง 47-2887.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 18 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act.
